about_the_game:
This is the official Game Manual as well as Artbook for Athenian Rhapsody - in these books, you'll find lots of never before seen beta-artwork and character designs, information about the game, and insight on how the game was created.

Whether you have an interest in the game's design, philosophy, or want something new to experience in the world of Athenian Rhapsody, both of these booklets have PLENTY of content to discover that you Athenian Rhapsodogs will LOVE to see!!!
detailed_description:
This is the official Game Manual as well as Artbook for Athenian Rhapsody - in these books, you'll find lots of never before seen beta-artwork and character designs, information about the game, and insight on how the game was created.

Whether you have an interest in the game's design, philosophy, or want something new to experience in the world of Athenian Rhapsody, both of these booklets have PLENTY of content to discover that you Athenian Rhapsodogs will LOVE to see!!!

name: Athenian Rhapsody - Artbook + Manual

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Computer should work fine
  • Processor: Recommended
  • Graphics: Great Graphics
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No sounds in these booklets
  • Additional Notes: Have Fun and Be Yourself
